content.detailedDescription:
This happened on a clear january night right around midnight in 1989 years before i joined mufon.  i am now a mufon field investigator #12347.
 
an object followed my car parallel to the road i was on then stopped when i stopped & observed me for 5 minutes.  i thought that it was a ufo (or still could be), but now i know about black helicopters and this could be what i saw, except there was no working parts that could be seen or heard, it just floated.
 
i was driving along knights road in philadelphia along with my ex-wife while we we were still dating to take her home and noticed this object following parallel to us out of my drivers side window. i rolled the window down so that i could see it clearer.  i crossed over street rd and pulled into a deserted parking lot, got out of my car and the object stopped, turned toward me, and dipped its front end. i stared at it, and it observed me from about 50 to 60 feet from the ground. the object was black and shaped like a helicopter, but had no working parts or lights. the object started following me in philadelphia, and stopped where i stopped in bensalem. it was a clear winter night. after observing me it moved away quickly and disappeared in the sky. the object didn't effect us in any way and after we left the parking lot, we continued along our merry way discussing what we saw.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: A black helicopter followed my car and stopped to observe me & my ex-wife.

content.detailedDescription: I was parking with a girlfriend early morning and i saw a bright light and thought it was the north star but it was 10 o'clock hight in the east. i had a high beam light and just playing around kept flashing it at the light ! this area had few houses and on top of a mountain, we could see car lights and the light got dimmer like it was moving up back into space. the car went by and the light came back even larger ( in the east about the half size of a dime ) bright as white as a star. it never moved for 10 to 15 min's. i kept flashing the high beam light, and the girl i was with started crying and getting upset, then it started to move but it changed from a white light to three lights ,red blue green in a tri. shape.
content.summary: It was like the north star only in the east.

content.detailedDescription: At about 5:20 am, i was getting in my truck to go to work.  when i noticed bright lights.  i was curious and continued to watch the two objects in the sky toward the southwest of my home approximately 2 miles away in the sky probably 400 feet of the ground.  the objects were not moving at all.  i know the stars placements well, as i am a retired soldier of 24 years in the army.  i know all my aircraft and  this was not an aircraft that i had ever seen.  the lights were pure, white light.  no other colors were visible.  i for some reason was not alarmed and sat in my truck observing the objects while running the heater in my truck because it was a clear, crisp and cold morning.  after watching these objects, i wanted to run in the house and get my family up.  but for some reason i did not.  i was afraid that i would miss some kind of and event.  i live about 20 miles from maxwell air force base that is in montgomery and about the same from an airport.  the only difference is i know aircraft configurations and this was no plane or helicopter.  these objects as fast and they appeared out of nowhere.  the lights went out and i never saw the ojects again.  since that morning, i have not observed anything else that could account for my sighting.  if others in the area observed anything, the new media did not mention it on the news.  i wondered if you network had simular sightings ina a around that date.
content.summary: [tg] 2 oval objects with extrememly bright lights

content.detailedDescription: for the past 5 or 6 years ive been seeing and taking pics of what appears to be a fixed star in the sky that's not moving but when i take pics of it i get something thats either serpant-like or gyrating loops with orbs present.The first set of pics i took 5 years ago were taken in my backyard in modesto,ca.Something told me to get a digital and take pics so i did.The gyrating or sometimes serpant looking ufo pics appear gold in color while the more recent one's sept.2007 appear silver.Plus the ufo in sept.2007 first appeared as a huge ball of white light in the east but when my girlfriend took the pics it didnt look like a ball of light but again something gyrating or making images in the sky.No these were not planes flying overhead in 2002 since it took the ufo all evening until late at night to finally cross the sky and then begin to descend as if to land(you can see this in the photos)i have lots of pics a couple of hundred of them...Interestingly the hugh ball of light which began to appear in the eastern sky at about 4:30 am and lasted until daylight  showed itself during the muslims holy days of ramadan(sept. 26-29-2007).I believe that the ufos are skywriting in order to send messages to those below and who are smart enough to figure it out.I have decoded some of the images i believe they are using an ancient sumerian language...
content.summary: Star-like,spheres and a big ball of light

content.detailedDescription: Sleeping outdoors with neighbor school friends when disc appeared and hovered over  house. disc was silent and approximately 100 ft. in diameter. ufo hunters is a reality series joke. hope you are a better group to express this with. it definitely was silent and not anything i had ever seen before.
content.summary: Hovered over the house

content.detailedDescription: I am 56 yrs old and have looked at the night sky my entire life, a lot. we were camped on the umpqua river above the scottsburg bridge about 4 miles on the south side. about 9 pm, i layed on the hood of a station wagon looking east. i could see a long ways east. it was a very clear night, i saw a flashing lite, long ways off to the east....3 flashes, wait 5 seconds, 3 flashes, very precise. every time it flashed it had moved right or left about 45 degrees in a zig zag pattern...It got real close to me and then went straight up. i saw it flash twice more and the last time it was so far away from me i couldn't believe it. u tell me.
content.summary: Saw a flashing light, veryrepetitive, chang directions, then fly straight up and away from me.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south bound on hyway 65 when i saw people outside there cars
parked on the side first i thought it was an accident but when i got closer
i noticed them looking up and that when i seen two  objects with light down the side. i rolled down my window but there wasnt any sound of a plane or helicopter
content.summary: There were two moving together lights down the side of objects

content.detailedDescription:
i went outside on my front porch and was drinking coffe it was about 11:30 pm it was a cool crisp night and i like to just sit out there and something to my left cought my eye up in the sky. there was a significatly brighter light in the sky in a part of the sky where there is not any bright stars out at that time usually its just those little bitty ones that you can just tell that they are there because they are so far away. this made those other stars look like fore ground.It was at first glance just a bright star but it had never been there before so i went ahead and sat down and just watched it thinking wow that sure is neat how it can change colors like that.I got up and ran in the house were it was dark closed my eyes and was thinking its just my eyes they are tired this is just my eyes being tired. i closed them and counted till 120 and took a deep breath and went back outside rushed back to the spot i was standing and it was still there i was freking out i could not beleive what i was seeing.I was totally floored. i tried to get it on video camera but i did not have night vision on the camera, so i could not see anything through the veiw finder. 
  my eyes were relaxed and i was not tired fully alert this thing started to move up and down sort of squiggilly movements and started this weired flashing type sequence with all of these different colors in a ballish circular motion the only way i can describe it was as morris code or something it would at the same time as changing colors would move. it went along in a fig. 8 pattern and up down and sideways.Then it would just sit still for like 10 minutes or so.And do it again it did this about 4 times. the second time it did it i saw another similar shape only bright white come across the sky towards it in its direction and do the same thing back to it and then it went passed it towards my left and pass it up.Shortly after that around 12:45am or so i swear these white streaks of really white lights would sort of come out of the bottom of it they looked like tails off of a shooting star or something only no sparkles more of a smokiness or light trail there was only about 4 or 5 of these they also went to the left of the object and it was sort of like it was following the other one.Then at 1:12am my husband came home from playing card with the neighbors and i told him about it and said you have got to see this this is real i am not crazy you have got to see this i am serious look it! so he 's like come on your crazy and i'm like just watch real carefully  and a few minutes later it started doing those weired patterns again and it moved up down if you were looking at a clock it moved  in the 1 oclock position from were it was previously sitting then back to were it was all the while changing colors and eveything it was doing before sticking pretty close to the same pattern everytime.Jimmy saw that and he's like did you just see that also and i'm like, told you so, our daughter woke up and he went in and laid down with her.I stayed out there for another hour watching it seeing ehat else it would do but it stopped moving as much and just stayed white. then it appeared to be moving toward my direction at that time it was a whitish color turning gold and orange and yellows then white agaian(probably our pollution thats up there because the moon does that sometimes here). it was getting easier to see and looked a little bit bigger that was around 2:42am. and started this weired flashing type sequence the only way i can describe it was as morris code or something it always paused after the patterns and the changing of the colors. it was almost 3 am and i had to get some sleep that was the last time i have seen it i have stayed up every night and at the same time gone out side to see  if it has been there and it is just not there the last two nights it has been cloudy and so i have not been able to see anything its going to rain soon. i have stayed up many nights looking at the stars from were i was sitting on the porch and i can honestly say that i have never seen anything like that before and i am now always going to look for it now on.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A round bright distinct light that changed color and shape and movement pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way back home to blackwell, ok. after attending a bible study in the nearby town of tonkawa, ok.  heading north toward blackwell in north central oklahoma about 9 pm i (and a friend) saw a cluster of 10 to 15 orangish objects.  they were midway between straight over head and the horizon. they were sort of "milling around."  they were not flying in any sort of sensibile way. the very odd thing was, it appeared that they were keeping pace with my car.  i would drive and then stop.  they would fly and then stop when i halted.  i did this a number of times.  the objects would move and stop with me.  it was not an optical illusion - they in fact kept pace with my car.  this, however, was not the weirdest or most unsettling aspect of this experience.  on subsequent evenings, i saw the objects repeatedly.  it seemed as if they were following me for next two or three days.   

i have thought about this occurence often over the past 33 years.  i have no explanation, none.  i was hopeful that maybe someone else may have had a similar experience.  

the experience scared me and still does.
content.summary: Multiple

content.detailedDescription: I was staying with family just next to the dolphin research center in grassy key, fl back in march. my girlfriend and i were sitting in the hot tub staring towards the east sky. about 10pm, i saw two round gold-yellow points of light fade into view quickly, side by side and make a u-turn about 6 feet to the right and just a hair lower of the constellation, [scorpio?] they dropped into the sky further, then the two spread apart slightly at the apex of the turn, then rose back up and moved closer together while disappearing at an angle to the left and above the entry point. it only lasted for a few seconds, and i only yelled out as much as "cool! met-e-o-rrr..." to my girlfriend before i realized it wasn't. i have to admit that i jumped the gun a bit and thought i had my first "ufo" sighting but after talking with my father a few minutes later we were left wondering if it were a pair of jets making a high speed bank turn in the distance or something going on up at disney world? just wondering if there were any other reports from that night, or if these could be lasers/light show or anything like that?
content.summary: Pair (2) formation of gold-yellow points of light

content.detailedDescription:
It was the late evening. i was having trouble with my sprint mobile phone's reception/signal in my house, so i went outside to my backporch/backyard to get a clearer/heavier signal. i was talking to my girlfriend.

it was chilly (i had on sweats and a sweatshirt and slippers). the night wasn't particularly clear (i can't remember just how cloudy it was, but it was overcast). i was facing the back of my yard (nw).

i noticed a really slow but huge object moving from my left to the right and then out of sight. it made no sound whatsoever, but i did discern some reddish lights in the pattern of an airplane's lights (so i thought).

the object seemed to be larger than any airplane i had ever seen. i thought to myself that it must be a huge cargo plane or something. it was seeming to go in a straight line towards my right (the ne), so i just shrugged it off as a big military craft.

i thought it was strange and i made a comment to my friend over the phone that i had seen a really big aircraft, but it was bigger than i had ever seen before.

it silently flew out of my view.

about a month later, i heard about the "ufo sightings over stephenville," but i still didn't put my experience with that, until a while later, when i said to my friend, "do you remember that i saw that really big object in the sky? i wonder if it was related to the ufo seen a month or so later."  i just moved to stephenville in the summer of 2006, so i feel like i am still getting my bearings. i wasn't sure about the object i saw in the sky; i just thought it was military related. when i heard all the other reports, i began to think i had seen something special that night.

i told my sister-in-law about it, and she encouraged me to report my experience to mufon. (...Which i now have done)
content.summary: Saw a huge, slow-moving (so it seemed) object moving from the nw toward the ne

content.detailedDescription: Two friends and i were grilling steaks in the front yard at approx. 10:30pm when one friend noticed something in the sky.  i saw a large red fireball moving slowly from the north to south.  the fireball was very red in color, was at about 45 degrees up, and did not change course or speed.  it took approximately one minute for the fireball to move across the sky until it was too small to see.  i thought then that it appeared to be something coming into the atmosphere from space, maybe space junk or a meteor, etc.  i have seen large meteors before, but i have never seen any that were red or lasted this long, or moved this slowly.  about 10 minutes later i was looking at the north sky and noticed another red fireball traveling in the same direction and speed as the first one.  this fireball seemed to be slightly larger than the first, and you could see a faint blur behind this fireball ��� almost a very short tail.  we watched this fireball for about 90 seconds before it was too small to see in the southern sky.  when i saw the first fireball, i thought that it was a meteor, etc. but after seeing a second large fireball i was unsure.  these were very large fireballs.  i did search the area newspapers during the next week, but did not find any articles about fireballs in the sky.
content.summary: 2 red fireballs move slowly across entire sky

content.detailedDescription:
Well we return to the board walk and sit on one of the benches its about 9pm or so now, and this yellow light out in the night sky turns on. no big deal, well another one pops on, still no big deal we thought. figuring helicopters or an airplane or something of that nature. well it looks like its moving towards the shoreline, which is ok, still thinking, cruise liner, helicopter, boat, plane something like that. well everyone's attention is turned to it, then all of a sudden the lights just sunk into the ocean. so we're kinda curious and freaked about it and don't know what to think. well some old guy is flipping out walking along.  


the thing that made me notice it is cause we were both looking out over the water. the other thing about this is that the light just flicked on, kind of like turning on a flash light but did not turn off as going into the water. shortly after this 2 or more choppers (appear to be night hawks) came flying in from pfab (patrick air force base. satellite beach florida). everyone there that witnessed this was in shock and awe, i've lived around bases all my life and by the water and have never seen anything like this before.

since then i have been carrying 2 different camera's with me when i go to the beach, although i have not witnessed anything like this again. but what strikes me odd is now i work for a local pc repair shop and i was talking to a customer just a month ago or so that works with the government (knew this cause as soon as he entered our store he hid his id tags that he was wearing). we were talking and he leaked out that he worked for a government organization, and told me where i could go to get more weird sightings but would have to be covert about it as the military has a real high presence in the area. stated that you could go to the melbourne international airport (mlb) and expect not to be allowed to enter, or exit if you fly in, as it will be crawling in military personel armed to the teeth.
content.summary: 2 lights over atlantic ocean

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were outside enjoying the clear night.  the stars were very bright.  my husband noticed something odd in the sky and pointed it out to me.  he had been watching it for about 5 seconds before i noticed it.  
we live near dallas/ ft. worth airport so we see and hear the planes flying over our house daily.  this was different.  usually the planes are coming in traveling to the south.  this object was traveling from south to north.  it had no wings or tail.  no lights.  i almost didn't notice it because it seemed faint and only reflecting the light from the ground.
also there was no sound.  there were other aircraft in the area but they were a distance away as we observed this sighting. my husband and i both agreed that it had the shape of a gel cap or cigar shape.
 it was moving faster than any of the planes in the sky.  faster than those coming in to the airport and faster than any planes flying above traveling over the airport.  
we have never seen anything like this.  i e-mailed a local tv station, curious if we were the only ones who noticed it.  i didn't get a response so we figured that no one else noticed it.  like i said it seemed faint and reflecting ground light so it doesn't surprise me.  any idea what we saw?  the whole event lasted maybe 10 seconds before it faded away.  
i thought maybe it was a meteor or birds possibly a small aircraft with a malfunction in its light system.  but none of that makes sense.  we have been curious ever since.  we would love to know if there is a logical explanation.
content.summary: Silent, traveling away from dfw airport no wings or lights.

content.detailedDescription: I looked up as i was leaving my house and saw the object "floating" and changing shape in the air.  the object appeared to be at about 2000ft. in the air.  the object resembled an extremely large plastic bag to the naked eye. the object appeared to tumble and changed shape.  it "floated" slowly over the house for ~20 minutes and slowly moved off the the northeast and dissappeared behind the horizon.  there was no noise.  i watched the history channel tonight and saw a very similar object that was filmed in stephensville tx at night.  this prompted me to send it in.  i took the pictures with a digital camera with a tripod.  the images i am sending had 12x digital zoom.  i have 16 other images.  i did not use the digital zoom on all of the images to try and preserve the resolution.  i would like to remain anonymous due to my occupation.  feel free to give me a call.
content.summary: Saw object "floating" about 2000 ft. in the air; look like a large plastic bag to the naked eye but too large at that altitude to be something common

content.detailedDescription:
Early that morning i was bringing in the trash cans. i went into the backyard and i heard voices behind my fence out on the road. i went to grab my propane tank and i noticed the bright lights in the sky. i woke up my wife and sons. i went in and grabbed my camcorder. i recorded 12 mins. of the 30 mins it was in the sky.The three blue lights circled clockwise most of the time then they slowed down and started turning counter clockwise. the flashing red light would disappear at times. i also noticed a dark round circle in the middle.As well as some weird lights in the middle that seemed to move around.I also recorded it taking off.There was also several other people out on the road behind my house that witnessed it and called 911. not sure what this means but the following afternoon 2 f-16's buzzed our neighborhood according to several of my neighbors. 
thanks,
luis j
content.summary: Three bright blue lights in a triangle rotating with red flashing light

content.detailedDescription:
Feb 22,2006
camcorder pointed n-e, 60 degrees approx, wide zoom, volume all the way up, and a clear night.I was in my back yard and set up where i set up the night befor, i did not see this happend not intill i watch it on my camcorder. i had my camcorder pointed at my neighbor back yard, and i could see a light comming off the eve and gutter on the house to the north, and it was moving south. the light became brighter when it came in between the two houses, how it went to the other side of the fence i don't know it didn't go over the top of the fence.

the blob of light was pointed more to the north and it stayed there for awhile, and the light reached obove the roof line,and then there was a burst of light that cover the corner of the house to the north,their was a burst of light and there was a beam of light pointed stright up, and a secound beam of light going back and fourth next to the first beam.

the big blob of light is now in the middle of the back yard, then there was another big flash which looked like a rainbow that went all the way up to the top of the screen on the camcord, it had little lines that went all the way around. it was very big compared to the two story house, and the beam of light is pointed stright up and the other one is moving back and fourth, how much i'm not sure and the beam seems bigger then before.

then the lights went out except for the blob of light, then that one went out. as i continue watching the tape there betwen the two houses you ould see a glow going off and on for about 8-10 times.
and when i thought it was over you could see in the backyard a object that seemed to bounce off the house by a window and shot off to the south at a angle.It wasen't very big. and then you could see a object go over the house on the north side and dip down. i looked at the house the next day but didn't see any marks on the house.I know the two sighting was for a reason and was able to get it on tape hi-8 both tapes. in the year of 2006 i have about 40 tapes. some with u.F.O moving and other moving so fast you had to frezze frame the object just to see what it was, some were very good and clear.
content.summary: Lights that shot off a bright rainbow with lines, and a blob of light, and 2 beams of lights

content.detailedDescription: I had 5 of these little people in my home and kind of put me in a vacume and i could here one tell the other i was a bad spicmen and then they were gone that time the story is much more involed but it would take me a week to type it  plus the 2 nd visit was different but same looking people different out come i tryed to send this 2 times and it would not go so im not going to type for hours again larry poch 407-957-4030 st. cloud fl.
content.summary: I saw people not the ship

content.detailedDescription: I am have been a pilot flying aircraft for 15 years so i know what aircraft look like at night. i took my dog out to the bathroom at 1230am est. i had looked into the sky and noticed a star like object. i looked again it had two intermittent white light that would go on and off around 2 min intervals, and also a red light that would sometimes flash, i do know that aircaft have a red anit-collision light but this was not a anit-collision light also there were no nav lights on the aircraft which aircrat have a red, and green one. then the object would move into circles then and then zig-zag then stop. all the lights would stop flashing and it would look like a star. then the whole sequence would start over and over agian. very odd to me this was not an aircraft. i got cold chills through out my body. i tried to take video of it but my cam coders battery was dead. as for my camera i did take pictures but them came out black with no detail, as it is not a great camera.
content.summary: Short bursts of a white then a red lights, then motionless like a star.

content.detailedDescription:
My sister-in-law and i were on our way from newport beach, ca to prescott, az for a family baby shower.  around 11pm, as i was driving, i saw a small but bright white light far away that was moving strangely across the mountains/hills... alternating between streaking along and then slowing to almost immediate halt. i said, "do you see that off to the right?" "yes" was her response.  then i asked her a question that one of my brothers had asked me some time before: "what would you do if an alien ship landed,took you onto their ship and invited you to travel with them... they assured you that you would not be harmed or abused in any manner, and that you would see wonderful things beyond your imagination; the experience of a lifetime... but!!  you would be missing "without a trace" for an entire week, you could have no contact whatsoever with your family, who would obviouly be distraught over your "dissapearance.  you would be safely returned after the week and able to explain your absence".  all this time we were glancing at the light. her answer was, "no way". i said that i would possibly do it, but only with my favorite brother (the one who asked me the question in the first place).  

at the end of my sentence, the light came straight at us at an unimaginable speed.  we thought it would slam into us, but it stopped "on a dime" directly to the right of us, about half a football field away, in a field of hay, or?  we could see the silhouettes of farm equipment.  the lights went out for about one second and then came the light show.  the craft was suspended in mid-air (about 3 feet off the ground).  when the white lights came back on, the sound was very like the sound of baseball field lights being turned on: "ch-chunk!"  the lights were under the craft, about the size of very large - semi truck-sized tires and covered by a kind of metal grid.  the shape was like a one-story long bell with a flat bottom - shaped like the brim of a hat. 

all this time we kept repeating "holy shit; oh my god", etc.  the craft then started doing things that were just a shock, like staying hovering in one spot, first spinning like a top, sideways for 4-5 seconds and then froze for 2-3 seconds and this time spun end over end)- again the ch-chunk, but the lights turned into a light show of blue, red, white, ??

our conversation turned to "what should we do, should we stop?" (me) and "no, keep going!!!" (her) and then, "let's just see what it does, come on!"  "no way, it's my car, just drive, keep going!!"  so i did.  we talked and freaked out all the way to prescott and when we arrived and relayed the story to my grandma, she said, oh, that must have been down there in congress; a lot of people see things down there."  the thing is, even though i had experimented with marijuana many years before, my sister-in-law has always been the most pragmatic, straight-laced person i know.  she drank hawaiian punch for her wedding toast.

i'll never forget it, whether it was a military exercise or extraterrestrial.
content.summary: Craft seemed to have listened in on our conversation from miles away

content.detailedDescription:
While sitting in the spa i usually stare at the sky and tonight there were winds up to 20mph with mostly cloudy skies. 
there was heavy light pollution (orange glow). 
while watching a break in the clouds i saw 2 disc-like objects in formation one on the right and one following at the leading object���s 7 o���clock at approximately 100 feet. 
the objects were heading from north to south towards san diego international airport.  
the speed is estimated at maybe 750 to 900 knots. 
the objects were only visible from the reflective orange glow of the city lights, this suggests a metallic surface. 
the objects appeared to be just above the cloud ceiling of about 1000ft. 
objects were nearly the length of a boeing 737 from estimation. 
objects had no lights of any kind emitting from what i could see. 
the fact that mcas miramar is a few miles away should be taken into consideration. but the speed, lack of required wing lights/strobes and extremely close proximity to a major airport suggests that the military is not responsible. 

i don't know why i have always looked at the sky, it's been a hobby/habit of mine since childhood. only recently have i started seeing unknown objects. this is the 2nd sighting i have witnessed in less than 2 months, both times were purely coincidence. (i.E. looking up in the right place at the right time for a few seconds) i feel excited and highly enthusiastic about witnessing/learning about my, and other people's sightings or experiences.
content.summary: 2 disc-like objects where flying in formation

content.detailedDescription: I was walking home after having dinner at a restaurant with my wife, we were walking east, and i suddenly had the urge to look up in front of me (at about the 11 o'clock position). i just felt like looking up and i saw an oval-shaped white light (about the size of venus) flash right into my eyes for about 1 second. then the flash stopped and the light became smaller, like the size of a regular star in the night, and moved off to my right, appearing to travel higher and higher until no longer visible. the night was clear and the stars that are out around this time of year were all visible. my wife did not see the initial flash of light but she did see the light as it receaded, getting smaller and smaller. the time was around 8:30 or 8:35 pm. this is the first time i have ever had an experience like this. it was exciting, like being acknowledged by some unknown force or intelligence. it really felt that something not of this world had just connected with me, as if saying "we see you. bye." wow, it was really amazing! since then, i've been looking up at the night sky hoping to see something like that again, but it hasn't happened. when i saw the flash of light, i had the distict feeling that "aliens" can see us all the time and can choose to make a connection whenever they want to.
content.summary: A light flashed into my eyes then moved away.

content.detailedDescription:
I am 39 years old now and i had my encounter when i was about 8 years old. i have never really talked about this incident to my family or anyone else. i did mention it to my wife a few years back and she kids me about it but believes i did see something special. the reason i want to log this info is because i believe that telepathic communication is the reason i had my sighting. for whatever reason that night i saw a ufo, i was looking out of my back window of my kitchen window hoping to see a ufo. i remember my eyes being glued to the backyard sky for some reason. i clearly saw a disc shaped craft fly effortlessly up towards my house. we lived in a rural/suburban neighborhood with 5 acres. the craft flew up very quickly and hovered over our small barn about 150 yards from the house. it then flew right up within 25 yards of my house where i was still sitting in the kitchen. the craft made no sound at all and moved like nothing i had ever seen before. i had a strong feeling that there was a kind of communication or mutual acknowledgement of the encounter. the craft made a small manuver across the window. i then turned back to yell for my mom but i didn't for some reason. i looked back to the window and saw the craft start moving out and it zipped away from the path it came. the speed of it's exit was incredible and like a straight streak of dim light. the best description that i can remember was that the craft was disc shaped, maybe 40-50 ft in size, black or dark gray colored with dim glow. 
i definitely saw a craft, not from this planet, that night and it definitely had a lifeforce that knew i was there.
i just wanted to get this logged finally.
because i wanted to see a ufo that night can make this encounter seem less credible or more credible since i feel telepathy had everything to do with it. only i know what i saw that night and i know it was as real as i am.
content.summary: Telepathic communication

content.detailedDescription: For almost two weeks now, my family and i have been witnessing an object in the northeastern sky that looks like a star from our porch. but this star moves. at first i thought maybe it was a drug helicopter flying over the woods. but it seemed to stay in the same area. after watching it for a few minutes i noticed it started to make these really quick movements, up and down, side to side and sometimes in a circular pattern at a high rate of speed. at times you can see flashing/strobing red and white lights on it. it is almost like it is trying to maintain a certain position. like maybe it is trying to appear as a star, but it is not doing a very good job of it. it does move up and over just as the stars do during the night, but the whole time it is bobbing and weaving. i have seen many planes and helicopters and know this is not either one of those. with seeing this i have been checking out the skies, and now the last two nights i have witnessed a number of other star looking objects which are also moving. last night 4/7/08 i witnessed a flash in the sky, and 3 lights move across the sky. i am not really familier with what sattelites look like when they pass, possibly that was what i saw move across the sky? but what are these star like lights that are moving around? this is kinda freaking me out a little, and i am trying not to alarm my family, but they have witnessed this as well. i have read a few reports that describe this same thing. what is going on here? after watching for a while, i usually have to go to bed, gotta work in the morning.
content.summary: Flashing light, star like, moving around

content.detailedDescription: I seriously doubt the reflection theory. i don't know if that is a head of grey or whatever but whoa!?! holy shit it looks like one! sorry mufon if we are abusing the database a little but this one is seriously good evidence.
content.summary: Alienhead!?!  image from sunroof enhanced of 2/22/08 video
content.locationName: San Fran ( just S on 5), California

content.detailedDescription:
On feb 21, 2006 i had my camcorder shooting the night sky, for the reason i have been seeing objects in the sky.
i had my camcorder pointed n-e, wide zoom, volume on high,pointed at my neighbor back yard, their house is a two story.

as i was watching the tape the next day i saw what looked to be the front of a cloud, intill it was moving much faster then a cloud, it came around my neighbor top of their secound story and came around towards the camcorder but would dissiapate, like it was never there.

then there came one that looked like it made a 90 degree turn right for my camcorder and lite up the whole area by the camcorder. i could see something in the very bright light, but i just couldn't make it out, i was hoping with better equipment we could go frame by frame. the most i could see in the bright light is what looks like a bright black line.

after it stop a few minutes later another wave of what all i could say what looked like a cloud, which was close togeather as it came around the house it spread out and was just gone.

1)i was in the back yard at the time but i didn't see anything, i must have been looking the othee way,i didn't even see any light off the wall of our house or on the ground.
2)when i saw it on the tape. 3)a cloud. 4)look obove. 5)i thought wow the light came right at my camcorder and they knew i was taping them. and it was something you could't make up, was the best part. 6) it just stop
content.summary: Looks like a cloud, but moves faster, and has detail and very bright.

content.detailedDescription: I did not see this happen. a friend named bob told me this, and these are his words: "around 1972 or 1973, i was driving through oklahoma, heading towards missouri- on an interstate highway. it was late at night and there was no traffic around me, so no headlights. a very bright ball of light came straight towards me just above the hood of my car - i saw it for a few seconds before it came to a stop at the edge of my hood, up my windshield and was gone. i was so shaken, i pulled over and got out of the car, but i had not been drinking and was wide awake, so i know it wasn't my imagination."
content.summary: Size of a basketball bright shining

content.detailedDescription:
we had just checked on the horses and crossed the creek. i needed to get rid of some water,( no drinking )  stepped out of the truck and walked behind, my lady stayed in the truck, truck was faceing north,. i was looking at the peaks in the moon light when this round glowing sphere appeared, it was going east to west looked like one of those earth globs that was a soft night light, bluish gray glow, it looked like it came from nowere just next to the west peak. could see the object for just a short time, about a 5 to 6 degrees of travel then left just as quick as it appeared. there was no sound, no fire, this was huge, size was about 20% of the peak from were i was located. the peaks are about 20 to 30 miles from sighting point. another way of discribing the sighting, is you are standing on one side of an open door way about two of three feet a way and something flies by. you can only see the object through the door way.
i could not believe my eyes, i new this was not from present earth. i ask my lady if she hae seen it but she was faceing the wrong way.

the reason i am just now saying something is i would like to know if anyone else has seen this type of ufo. personally i have not seen this type of craft in any ufo files. the time of sighting could be off by a lot the timeing is a guestiment. but i will never forget the feeling or the ufo.
content.summary: Faceing south towords the twin peaks on land just off of highway 160 mile marker 287

content.detailedDescription: about 10 years my boyfriend and i were watching the stars on the banks of the mississippi river.It was a beautiful clear weekend, no clouds whatsoever. we were house sitting for a friend and the river was completely quiet.We were laid back in our lawn chairs when across the river on the grafton, illinois side i noticed an orange glowing star (or so i thought) above the tree line of the bluffs. i pointed it out to him with a lithium flashlight we were using because it was so dark. i thought it must be a planet as it rose above the horizon because it glowed so brilliantly.It appeared to grow larger and i'm not sure at that point if it was because it was getting closer or if it intensified it's lights because i pointed and fixed my flashlight on it. but it did get closer, it began to come directly at us at a slow and steady pace, it came across the river midway across the river it was softball sized at arms length.There was no sound. we were terrified but at the same time transfixed on the object so we just stood there with our arms around each other.It hovered for some time then quickly moved to the missouri side of the river to a marina two houses from the house we were house sitting at where it remained for maybe 60 seconds, it sort of floated with jerky motions and at this point it was basketball sized at arms length it was probably 100 yards away from us, and 30 feet in the air, it hovered between two trees although it was only for a minute it seemed like forever. i kept wondering "why doesn't it do something?"the from behind us a smaller version came from behind the house and very quickly connected with the large object not touching but almost connected by a liquid light. the objects glowed the brightest orange gold almost painful to stare at but we couldn't stop watching they stayed fixed for a minute, they looked like a piece of candy from my childhood (circus peanuts) only the glow from it was something i have never seen before and have never seen since . after hovering it/they  seemed to morph into a cylinder shape. the orange glow turned a brilliant white and it almost disappeared into itself dimming from the outside in till it was gone, this happened very quickly maybe 3 seconds. he and i sat on the ground and talked about what we saw and there is no possibility it was any type of commercial aircraft there was no sound before or  after. we watched the sky for hours afterwards but saw nothing else. we have talked about it on and off for years but swore we would never go public with it. he passed away last spring so i have decided to talk about it now, as he would have never gone along with it.This first object came from the grafton side of the river and i did some research on the piasa bird a mythical birdlike creature the mississippian/sioux indians claimed came out of the caves on the bluffs, and out of the river and kidnapped people who never returned.I have been obsessed with the memory of this sighting for years and it gives me peace to have it off of my chest now.Since the sighting the number 3 has seemed very important, triangles , pyramids.. seem to be something i obsess over. i don't know if it's related to the sighting but i was wondering if anyone else has had the same obsession or if i am crazy.Have there been any other sighting reported in recent times in the grafton or portage de sioux areas?
content.summary: Memorial day weekend, while house sitting for a friend, my boyfriend and i were watching the stars on the mississippi river

content.detailedDescription: Its not an alien, its the reflection of the driver
content.summary: Re: video still of alien in ufo sighting
